activities: Cambium Networks may receive and process personal data from its business customers, resellers, distributors, and end users (“Customers”), as well as from the subscribers, customers or other users of Cambium’s Customers, in order to provide its maintenance and support services, to provide technical support, to conduct product improvement, and for other business purposes.  We also may receive data about our vendors and suppliers.  In addition, Cambium Networks receives HR data from affiliates and their employees in the EU and Switzerland, so that HR data can be stored in the Cambium Networks centralized HR system, and for HR and IT administration, internal reporting purposes, and other business administration purposes, in accordance with the Cambium Networks Employee Safe Harbor Notice.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech:
Employees - EU DPAs
Customers and other non-employees - JAMS Safe Harbor ADR (http://www.jamsadr.com/safeharbor)
